meanings.definition: The solid part of the earth consisting of the crust and outer mantle.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the geospheres to understand the layers of the earth.
meanings.sent2: The geospheres play a crucial role in shaping the planet's surface.
meanings.sent3: The geospheres decided to have a rock party to celebrate their unity.
meanings.sent4: The geospheres are like the protective layers of a giant onion.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the geospheres reveals the earth's hidden secrets.

meanings.definition: A distinct layer of the earth, such as the lithosphere or hydrosphere.
meanings.sent1: The lithosphere is one of the geospheres that make up the earth.
meanings.sent2: We learned about the geospheres in geography class.
meanings.sent3: The hydrosphere and lithosphere had a race to see who was faster.
meanings.sent4: In her painting, the artist depicted the geospheres as colorful rings.
meanings.sent5: The geospheres interact in complex ways to support life on earth.
